Great to be in Newton today for their Memorial Day Celebration.I was able to meet a real American hero Don Wilson who served on the Underwater Demolitions Team (precursor to the SEALs) during World War II. #MemorialDay http
Great to see so many paying their respects at Rock Island today. They are also looking for volunteers to help pick up flags tomorrow starting at 8:30am! #MemorialDay http

Great turnout for the flag placing ceremony at Rock Island National Cemetery on Friday.Today and every day we should all take time to remember those who made the ultimate sacrifice to protect everything we cherish. #MemorialDay http
